```{r setup}
library(DAISIE)
```

I show TRASIE here:

Here I create params:

```{r}
create_trait_state_params(
     trans_rate = 0,
     immig_rate2 = 0.,
     ext_rate2 = 0.2,
     ana_rate2 = 0.3,
     clado_rate2 = 0.4,
     trans_rate2 = 0.5,
     M2 = 1000)
```

Here I run a sim:

```{r}
DAISIE_sim()
```
